c.t: ACT AUTHORIZING CONTRACTING FOR PORTFOLIO MONITORING SERVICES
c.sp: library|us/nsn/san-ildefonso/council/resolutions|2023|Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R23-002|

c.x: the Pueblo has trust funds administered by the Bureau of Indian Affairs.
the Pueblo has determined the need to contract with a portfolio monitoring
The Governor is directed and authorized to negotiate and execute a contract
The provision of such services shall be provided on a contingency-fee basis
Sole source contracting is authorized for a qualified company.
